caption:
“Discipline is the highest form of devotion.”

Reflection:
True worship is not emotion but endurance. The disciplined soul keeps faith when fervor fades, serving love with steady hands.

Commentary:
Discipline here means faithfulness in practice — prayer, work, and patience. Devotion is proven not by feeling inspired but by showing up daily.
